Amazon's deals on Apple continue, with today's price drop hitting the M4 Mac mini with 512GB of storage.

The $100 price cut at Amazon applies to Apple's M4 Mac mini featuring an upgrade to 512GB of storage. Now on sale for $699.99, some accounts may see an on-page coupon that stacks with a smaller discount, while others may see the full savings as an instant rebate.

Buy for $699 at Amazon

With a compact chassis that measures in at only 5 inches x 5 inches x 2 inches, the M4 Mac mini fits on nearly every desk with ease. It also comes standard with 16GB of unified memory, double that of the standard last-gen M2 model.

With 512GB of storage, there's more flexibility to store files locally compared to the standard model with 256GB, and you can always pair it with an external drive for additional space.

According to our M4 Mac mini Price Guide, which tracks the lowest prices across leading Apple resellers, this $699 price is the lowest available, with other retailers charging at least $30 more for the same config.

You can also check out the best Mac mini deals in our dedicated roundup.

Amazon also has numerous other Apple products and complementary accessories discounted for Memorial Day. Here are a few bargains worth checking out:

  • Apple Watch Series 10 GPS with 42mm Aluminum Case (select colors): $299 ($100 off)

  • M4 iPad Pro 11-inch (2TB, Wi-Fi, Standard Glass, Space Black): $1,699 ($300 off)
